attributes.action: Create a Charity Tax for Bankers Bonuses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I petition the Government to create a Charity Tax on the bankers Bonuses. I propose that the level should be a minimum of 0.5% of the bonus. This Charity Tax should be more acceptable to the Bankers than an imposed government tax which is once paid not traceable.
